phrases: Why would you do that to me?!
There is no way I can eat human flesh!
I am not like you monsters!
If I am a monster, what does that make you?
I am begging you, please, tell me...
What am I supposed to do?
Everything has sucked since that day!
I wish you would tell me something.
What does cake really taste like?
It is so nasty, it makes me want to puke, so I cannot tell,
but it is something that humans enjoy eating, is not it?
What was it like, living a peaceful life?
One where you did not need to live in fear of CCG and other ghouls?
Does that mean that everything since I was born has sucked?
Tell me, oh tell me, the way it works
Who is that inside of me?
Here in this broken-down, broken-down world,
you laugh, without seeing a thing
I am just so damaged, I hold my breath and freeze
When I found you, it shook me
In this twisted world, I am gradually growing transparent and vanishing
Do not look for me; do not look at me
I do not wish to hurt you in a world
You are not a ghoul, that is for sure.
But you are not human, either.
There is no place left for a half-and-half like you anywhere now.
If you want to be human so badly,
why do not you see how long you can starve?
I will tell you right now,
starvation for a ghoul is utter hell.
Toka, I think that is quite enough.
It must be hard on you, huh?
it is our policy to help out our fellow ghouls.
Kaneki, take a good look at this coffee.
But no matter what I eat, it tastes awful...
Through the ages, coffee is the only thing
that ghouls have been able to enjoy, the way humans do.
However, we cannot satisfy our hunger by drinking it alone.
When you need more, come on back.
Sir, why did you help that guy?
there was a story about an organ transplant on the news, remember?
Some steel beams fell, and two students were crushed beneath them.
The doctor took it upon himself to transplant the organs
from the deceased girl into the surviving young man's body.
But the girl that died in that accident was...
He has had ghoul organs transplanted into him.
It is the first time I have seen this happen,
but his body may be becoming like ours.
You are neither a ghoul, nor a human.
There is no place left for a half-and-half like you anywhere now.
Who cares if you are a half-and-half?
Neither a human, nor a ghoul...
That delicious flesh is waiting for you.
It is so delicious, it is tantalizing.
Once you start eating it, you will not be able to stop.
It will put any steak to shame.
New message Hide Sub: You are going to die alone
Missing you a bunch in Asian History...
Missing you a bunch in Asian History...
Have you ever been to the sweets shop in front of the station?
That place has the tastiest stuff, huh?
How long are you going to skip class, you jerk?!
When rabbits get lonely, they can die!
Hide, I am sorry, I am sorry.
And what is up with the eye patch?
While you were gone, I was so bored that before I knew it,
-I would joined the school festival planning committee...
Seems like this happened before once...
How long are you going to stay home?!
Do you know how hard it is for me when you stay home like this?!
Hey, are you listening to me, Kaneki?
Anyhow, I have got to go see that upperclassman with the sharp tongue
to borrow some material from him.
You have got to eat, or you will ruin your health.
He is always been like that.
Hide is sharp witted in some odd ways.
He is overly aware of the sentiments of others, so instead,
he pretends not to notice anything, out of concern for me.
If I were to stop being human,
would we never be able to walk together again?
I have been wanting to introduce him to you, Kaneki.
I do not know whether to describe him as toxic, or bad-mouthing,
or just as someone I feel uneasy around...
Nothing pisses me off more than having my territory violated.
Oh, this is Kaneki, the good friend I mentioned before.
Nishio Nishiki, second year, School of Pharmacy.
Yes, I wanted to see the retail data.
Oh, where did I put that?
Aw, it might be at home.
Nagachika, why do not you come with me to grab it right now?
Kaneki, sorry, but I have to stop by Mr. Nishio's place,
so head on out without me.
Um, is it okay if I go, too?
It is not like I am planning on letting him in.
Before we go, I have to smooth this over.
What is with you, all of a sudden?
How much did you see earlier?
-Why are there ghouls popping up around me?
-Why are there ghouls popping up around me?
They were there before this all started.
I am the one who wandered into this.
Kaneki, are you in any clubs?
Oh, I do not do that well around large groups.
The exact opposite of Nagachika, huh?
Can a ghoul eat something like this?
Kaneki, are not you eating yours?
He really does blend in to human society
I am sure nobody suspects that he is a ghoul.
It would mean trouble if anyone saw this.
Who would have guessed there would be another ghoul on the same campus?
You stink just like a female ghoul!
You were planning to eat Nagachika, were not you?
There is nothing better to whet the appetite
than that moment you turn on some idiot who completely trusts you,
and that look of anguish that crosses their face
when the foolish human gives up hope, is there, Kaneki?!
Having a kid younger than me talk back to me really pisses me off.
I thought it might be tofu.
Geez, how can humans eat that stuff?
It feels like eating horse crap.
I have befouled your meal, here.
You have known this guy a long time, right?
Just when were you going to eat him?
What were you going to eat first?
You know, you just do not get it, do you?
Humans are nothing but things to eat,
the way that cows and pigs are to them, right?
playing like you are friends with what amounts to livestock?
Then again, I think Nagachika is risky.
Even you have to be aware that having someone
as shrewd as he is by your side is going to be dangerous.
You cannot even control your own eyes.
Or should I kill Nagachika first?
I guess I have toyed with you more than enough.
And I could have taken no time at all by releasing my kagune.
I can beat someone like him...
Hurry up, before I crush him.
You have helped me again, have you?
You are always reading books by yourself at school, huh?
I just moved here, so I do not have any friends.
So would you be my friend?
Even then, when I did not get along well in class,
Hide was concerned, and reached out to me.
I will not let that happen!
I am dying, dying, dying, dying, dying, dying, dying, dying, dying!
You want him so bad you cannot stand it, right?
You do not have to put up with it.
You are not doing anything wrong.
You can do as you like.
This is my special treat, is not it?
He is my friend, so I have to eat him!
You are becoming so much more like us, huh, half-ass?
Your sense of reason has given way to hunger, has not it?
You do not give a damn about your own friend's life now.
After you gobble this guy up, you will regret it.
In a sea of blood and entrails.
Such is a ghoul's hunger, and our destiny.
I will be understanding this one time.
So go down nice and easy!
I have been... stricken with this hunger this whole time.
I was so hungry, I thought I might die.
I did not even realize what I was doing.
And then, I went after Hide...
But right now, that is completely gone.
That blood that was in my mouth-
What did you do while I was asleep?
There is only one way to satisfy a ghoul's hunger.
You know what that is, right?
The way you were going, you would have set upon your friend.
You have to know what you are.
Which means, I cannot be around Hide anymore.
But I cannot enter the world of ghouls, either.
I, who am neither human nor ghoul, am all alone.
There is not a place for me anywhere now...!
You are both ghoul and human.
You are the one and only person who has a place in both worlds.
I am sure it will lead you to the path
in which you can keep your own place.
I also want you to understand us better.
To see whether or not we are just ravenous beasts.
you start by learning how to make a delicious cup of coffee?
do you think even I can do it?
This is perfect weather for us to work in, is not it?
According to the 20th Ward Branch's report,
three months ago, there was a predatory incident
by what they believe was a binge eater here in this building,
and there were eyewitness reports of a Jason sighting at that time.
I doubt they were cordially sharing a meal, though.
If I had to offer one drawback to this rain,
it would be that I cannot hear the scumbags' throes of death!
It feels like eating horse crap.
Mr. Nishio, you know what horse manure tastes like?
What are you, an idiot, Kaneki?!
Mr. Nishio has eaten horse crap?!
And every other kind of feces, it seems.
You are a disgrace as a ghoul.
